Range slider API

Range slider offer two handles to set a min and max value along a numeric continuum.

Basic range slider

Step attribute

No highlight

Theme

Mini

Disabled

Label hidden

Fieldcontain

Fieldcontain, mini

Fieldcontain, hidden label

Fieldcontain, hidden label, mini

Grid

We make the grid blocks 100% width below 28em with custom CSS.
